title: How easy is it to start a podcast? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it’s extremely easy. The first thing you need is an audio host, and Anchor - The easiest way to make a podcast is FREE. You can even record right from their app using your smartphone. It’s available on both Android and iPhone. If you want to get a bit more complicated, you can record from your computer, but I suggest having a decent microphone. There are many affordable ones available on the market. You can record and edit your audio using https://AudacityTeam.org. You can still use Anchor - The easiest way to make a podcast to upload your episodes. You’ll need a couple graphics as well. You need a square logo for your podcast that is 1400x1400 pixels, and a thumbnail version sized down to 300x300 pixels. Check out Anchor’s app. They will prompt you in everything you need to do to set up, record, and begin distributing your podcast. Check out this article for a detailed tutorial - The Quick and Dirty Podcast Tutorial - No Money Needed - HeyYoAva.com
